item.title: Banana Pancakes
item.description: One of my absolute favorite recipes. It was discovered, and altered by my wife. I enjoy them most with peanut butter and warm berries that were heated from frozen. Try them with any toppings you’d like. Use 1-1 gluten free baking flour to make it GF. Ingredients 4 mashed bananas. 5 if you’re extra. 2 tsp vanilla 4 eggs 3 tsp baking powder 3/4 cup flour 1 tbsp of butter per pan.
